CHAT.comment: April and her Mother are in the living room sitting on a couch. In front of them on a coffee table is a large array of Smurfs.
April is the only child of a divorced undergraduate student at a land grant university

u.a: April puts the Smurf into her mouth
April begins standing the Smurfs on their feet
referencing the Smurf she is holding
referencing the Smurf in her hand
April picks up the broken Smurf again
April picks up a Garfield toy
April picks up another Smurf and wants her mother to set it up at the end of the line but there is no room .
sets the Smurf at the other end of the line . April looks at the camera
pom is Tom , the camera operator
mother straightens the sock , April looks at her own leg .
April pulls mother's head down to her leg and mother kisses the owie
mother leaves the room , April turns to Roy
mother comes back with the child's blanket and puts it on April's chair
April sits , picks up a glass of apple juice and drinks
April puts the glass down and then moves it
April picks up a Smurf and begins to wipe it with the cloth
April drops the cloth and points at the Smurf she is holding
April reaches for the next Smurf and the one next to it in the line falls down
April picks up the fallen Smurf , sets it right , picks up another Smurf and looks at the camera .
April stands up and looks at the camera
April plays with the Smurf in her hand
April puts down the Smurf she is holding and picks up the one next to the Smurf her mother pointed to
puts down the Smurf she's holding and picks up the one she just set down
April puts the Smurf down and then picks up another one
April puts down the Smurf she is holding , picks up the one with the broken drum and leaves the room

mother follows April out of the room , silence , they both return , child is biting a Smurf in her right hand and has a doll's cradle in her left hand . April looks at the Smurf and turns to her mother and then holds out the Smurf .
they sit at the coffee table again
mother begins to move the Smurfs to the end of the table
April begins to play with the doll she has been holding for a while , it is on a scooter , she makes engine noises .
April pulls the scooter over and adjusts the doll
mother hands the Smurf in the car to April , April makes car noises . April moves the scooter around and continues to make car noises .
April looks closely at the doll
mother picks up the doll and points at it
mother points to things on the doll as she speaks
picks up her glass and drinks
mother moves the doll and pulls a book from the pile of books on the table
silence , they both return , April has a book
April sits and drinks some juice
mother puts the book April brought in on the pile , April looks at the book she is holding
April reaches for the book that her mother just moved
they look at the book , turning the pages at random and commenting as they go .
April reaches for the book which she brought in
April tries to put the old book on the pile
April pulls another book off the pile and puts it in front of her mother
April takes her book to Roy
mother moves April's chair closer to the table
April moves the chair closer to the table
mother puts the book back on the pile and April gets the book that they have already read
knocks some Smurfs over with the book as she moves it .
mother is not following the conversation
April points to something the Cookie_Monster is eating
mother returns with the apple juice
someone knocks at the door , April's mother is the head resident in the graduate residence hall .
April takes a drink of the juice
April doesn't look as she puts the cup down
mother points to a stain on the page
Shirley's is the play school April attends
April looks in to her cup
April makes noises in her drink
mother picks up the blanket which has slipped on to the floor
April takes a drink of juice
